subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton won the German Grand Prix in Hockenheim with two dramatic passes that made up for a strategic blunder by his McLaren team, solidifying his lead in the Formula One standings. Hamilton overtook Ferrari’s Felipe Massa, then the runner-up Nelson Piquet Jr. of Renault at the same hairpin after a crash involving Timo Glock brought out a safety car that nearly cost Hamilton his fourth victory of the season.
